author: Jose C. Cisneros "amateur in every respect"

review: It isn't bad, and normally I don't mind being a part of beta tests - but the functionality is poor. It doesn't work on Amazon prime, HBO Now, and many many many others. I was thinking these would be added relatively quickly, but it seems like that is not the case. I wish it would just work with more things.
author: christina

review: Great product you're just limited too the videos you can cast on  your device mainly just youtube
author: Nikki Allison

review: Underwhelmed. Connection and buffering issue is much higher than expected. I've used less than 5 times since I've bought it.
author: Rebecca Busterud

review: HDMI EXTENDER CABLE DIDNT WORK. Sorry for all the caps but I'm not going back to fix it. Works fine for steaming movies on with TV Cast so it's everything I needed.
author: T Klink

review: I have 75' Samsung curved UHD TV and wasn't sure why I would need this ever. I got it when it went on sale to play with it and had to buy 2 more. I don't use it on my Samsung smart tv because there is no need, I can screen mirror from my Samsung 6s. But for my garage and both of my kids this is awesome. I was even able to send back the Direct TV boxes from there rooms! If wasn't for Direct TV's exclusive on the NFL, I would drop them all together. If you can find it for $20 bucks like I did why not try it out?
author: Moose9779

review: Literally, one of the best and most useful purchases i have ever made
author: D Scott
